casebody.data:
Before Fitzsimons, Oh. J., and O’Dwyer, J.

Jacob Samak, Respondent, v. Maurice L. Muhleman et al., Appellants. Appeal from a judgment of the City Court of the City of New York in favor of plaintiff and from an order denying a motion for a new trial. Jacob Brenner, for appellants; Nichols & Bacon (Alexander S. Bacon, of counsel), for respondent.

Judgment affirmed, with costs. No opinion.
